title: The Old Coal Miner's Lamp
description: After Billy loses his life in a mining accident, he becomes the carrier of the Old Coal Miner's Lamp, helping to guide other lost souls on their way to the Light. Mike begins having strange flashes of the past and seeks out the help to make sense of what he is going through. Danielle answers the call to assist Mike with his visions, but when she too begins to have some strange sensations, will she continue to search for the truth or steer clear of the unknown?Connections will be revealed and a darkness will rear its head along the way.Will Billy, Mike, and Danielle be able to work together to overcome the obstacles and defeat the darkness?
author: Vicky Peplow
